edu.rit.se.coolTeamB.core

Class Item

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.rit.se.coolTeamB.core.Item

  • public class Item
extends java.lang.Object
    The Item Java class stores relevant data of the items stored in a local vending machine connected to the Smart Vending Machine (SVM) system.
    Version:
    1.00 22 Mar 2013
    Author:
    Raphael Kahler (rak9698@rit.edu)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Item(java.lang.String itemName, double itemPrice, java.util.Calendar itemExpDate)
      Item stores relevant item information necessary for use in the vending machine system.

      • Item

        public Item(java.lang.String itemName,
    double itemPrice,
    java.util.Calendar itemExpDate)
     throws NegativeInputException,
            NullDateException
        Item stores relevant item information necessary for use in the vending machine system.
        Precondition:
        itemPrice is not negative, date is not null
        Parameters:
        itemName - name of the item
        itemPrice - price of the item
        itemExpDate - expiration date of item
        itemExpDate - expiration date of the item
        Postcondition:
        item was created with specified name and price and expiration date
        Throws:
        NegativeInputException
        NullDateException
